createGLSL

public static ImmModeSink createGLSL(GL gl,
                                     int glBufferUsage,
                                     int initialSize,
                                     int vComps,
                                     int vDataType,
                                     int cComps,
                                     int cDataType,
                                     int nComps,
                                     int nDataType,
                                     int tComps,
                                     int tDataType)
Uses a GL2ES2 GLSL shader immediate mode sink. To issue the draw() command, a ShaderState must be current, using ShaderState.glUseProgram().

See Also:
draw(GL, boolean), ShaderState.useProgram(GL2ES2, boolean), ShaderState.getCurrentShaderState()
